game.name: Remember the Numbers
game.description:
Do you think that you have a sharp memory when it comes to remembering multiple numbers? Are you a quick puzzle solver? Join Remember the Numbers game and prove the world that nobody can beat you in recognizing the numbers fast! When you click the play button, you would see that multiple numbers from 1 to 10 will keep popping up on the screen. All you need to do in this brand new arcade game is to find out their right sequence before they disappear. 

The real challenge is that you would be given only 3 seconds to remember the sequence of numbers.  Touch the screen to know where the numbers, in an ascending order, were seen on the screen! If you reply the correct answer, your game will continue with the new numbers. However, you have to start your game from the beginning in case if you fail in an attempt in this html5 puzzle challenge. Ask your kids to try out this game to know how good he or she is at remembering what numbers are hidden behind the circles! 

There are different difficulty levels including easy, medium and hard to enjoy online, no download required on atmegame.com. The harder level you play, the more circles will pop up on the screen. Try to focus on the screen and challenge your memory to spot all the hidden numbers in an ascending order as fast as you can to complete the game with 3 stars rating! Play this memory game for kids on multiple devices and have fun with your friends without download!
